title: 下载：帮助癌症幸存者生育并清理孟加拉国的服装业
content: 这是今天版本的《下载》，这是我们的平日时事通讯，每天提供技术世界中正在发生的事情。一项实验性手术正在帮助癌症幸存者分娩 一项实验性手术正在帮助人们在产后生育
original_title: The Download: helping cancer survivors to give birth, and cleaning up Bangladesh’s garment industry
original_content: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. An experimental surgery is helping cancer survivors give birth An experimental surgical procedure that’s helping people have babies after they’ve had

title: OpenAI 解散任务调整团队
content: 该团队的领导者被任命为 OpenAI 的首席未来学家，而其他团队成员则在整个公司进行了重新分配。
original_content: The team's leader has been given a new role as OpenAI's chief futurist, while the other team members have been reassigned throughout the company.

title: Uber Eats 推出人工智能助手，帮助创建杂货车
content: Uber Eats 推出了一项新的人工智能功能“购物车助手”，可以根据文本或图像提示自动将商品添加到购物车中。
original_title: Uber Eats launches AI assistant to help with grocery cart creation
original_content: Uber Eats launched a new AI feature, “Cart Assistant,” that can automatically add items to your cart based on text or image prompts.

title: 前 Founders Fund 风险投资人 Sam Blond 推出人工智能销售初创公司，颠覆 Salesforce
content: 这家初创公司 Monaco 已经走出了隐秘状态，成为了一款人工智能原生一体式 CRM 以及由 Collison 兄弟和 Garry Tan 等人支持的更多系统。
original_title: Former Founders Fund VC Sam Blond launches AI sales startup to upend Salesforce
original_content: The startup, Monaco, has come out of stealth as an AI-native all-in-one CRM plus more system backed by names like the Collison brothers and Garry Tan.

title: 我很喜欢我的 OpenClaw AI 代理——直到它对我发起攻击
content: 我使用病毒式人工智能助手来订购杂货、分类电子邮件和谈判交易。然后它决定欺骗我。
original_title: I Loved My OpenClaw AI Agent—Until It Turned on Me
original_content: I used the viral AI helper to order groceries, sort emails, and negotiate deals. Then it decided to scam me.

title: OpenAI 放弃其人工智能硬件的“io”品牌
content: 法庭提交的一份商标诉讼文件显示，OpenAI 不会在其人工智能硬件设备上使用“io”这个名称，该设备预计要到 2027 年才会发货。
original_title: OpenAI Abandons ‘io’ Branding for Its AI Hardware
original_content: A court filing in a trademark lawsuit reveals OpenAI won't use the name “io” for its AI hardware device, which isn't expected to ship until 2027.

title: 美国将 SpaceX 列为公共航空承运商，将根据铁路法对公司进行监管
original_title: US labels SpaceX a common carrier by air, will regulate firm under railway law

title: DevDay 发布的 AMA
content: 这是历史上成为建设者的最好时代。在 DevDay 2025 上，我们推出了下一代工具和模型，以帮助开发人员更快地编码、更可靠地构建代理并扩展他们的应用程序
original_content: Its the best time in history to be a builder. At DevDay 2025, we introduced the next generation of tools and models to help developers code faster, build agents more reliably, and scale their apps in

title: xAI向公众展示了星际野心
content: 周三，xAI 采取了罕见的举措，将其完整的 45 分钟全体演示文稿发布到 X 平台，使其广泛可用。
original_title: xAI lays out interplanetary ambitions in public all-hands
original_content: On Wednesday, xAI took the rare step of publishing its full 45-minute all-hands presentation to the X platform, making it widely available.

title: 随着联合创始人的离开和 IPO 的临近，埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 将话题转向月球
content: 据《纽约时报》报道，马斯克在听取了这次会议后告诉员工，xAI 需要一个月球制造设施，即月球上的一个工厂，用于制造人工智能卫星，并通过巨型弹射器将它们发射到太空。
original_title: With co-founders leaving and an IPO looming, Elon Musk turns talk to the moon
original_content: According to The New York Times, which reports that it heard the meeting, Musk told employees that xAI needs a lunar manufacturing facility, a factory on the moon that will build AI satellites and fling them into space via a giant catapult.
